title: Giro d’Italia Stage 10: Paret-Peintre Denies Tratnik for Mountaintop Win, Pogačar Fends Off Late GC Pressure
content:
'One more day ticked off': Pogačar marks the moves and loses no time in final-kilometer GC accelerations.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 10: Paret-Peintre Denies Tratnik for Mountaintop Win, Pogačar Fends Off Late GC Pressure on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
